alertInfo: Anyone with the link can view this draft document and will continue to see the updates until the draft has been published or deleted.
noSharedLinks: No shared links found this document.
emailInfo: Recipients will receive an email with a link to view this draft document.
instruction: Use commas to separate multiple email addresses. Recipients must log in to the Clearing-House with this email address in order to view the draft record.
generatePDFRecord:: Generate a PDF of this draft record:
processTakesTime: This process takes a long time to load. The recommended method to share draft records is to use the
selectLanguage: Select a language to initiate the PDF generation process.
